ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Hard ionizing radiation and solar UV radiation RKI-2
ResourceHeader.Description: This instrument measures ionizing radiation at 5, 15, 40, 100, and 500 MeV, and UV radiation from the Sun.

InformationURL.Name: NSSDC's Master Catalog
InformationURL.Description: Information about the Hard ionizing radiation and solar UV radiation RKI-2 experiment on the Interball Tail Probe mission.
